projects.title: APC Enugu 2027 Election Platform
projects.description: High-performance grassroots mobilization platform connecting voters to leadership through real-time membership registration, news updates, and an interactive polling unit locator for all 17 LGAs in Enugu State.
projects.longDescription:
The APC Enugu 2027 project is a comprehensive digital advocacy solution designed to bridge the gap between political leadership and the electorate.

Key features include:
* **Polling Unit Locator:** A custom-built, responsive tool allowing voters to instantly find their specific polling unit across 17 Local Government Areas without page reloads.
* **Membership Portal:** A seamless digital registration system that captures volunteer data and issues unique membership IDs.
* **Admin Dashboard:** A secure, PHP-based backend for campaign managers to publish news, manage registered members, and oversee community forums.
* **Community Forum:** An interactive space for constituents to discuss policies and receive updates.
* **Performance First:** Architected with Vanilla JavaScript and native PHP to ensure sub-second load times on 3G mobile networks, making it accessible to the widest possible audience.

settings.heroSubtitle: AI & ML Engineer | End-to-End Data Solutions Architect | Full-Stack Mobile & Web Developer
settings.aboutContent:
I design and deploy end-to-end AI and data-driven solutions by integrating machine learning, advanced analytics, and full-stack mobile and web development to build scalable, production-ready systems. With over three years of hands-on experience, I transform complex data into actionable insights and develop intelligent applications that deliver measurable impact.

I excel in solution architecture, data pipeline optimization, cloud-native development, API integration, and deploying AI models in real-world environments. My work combines technical depth with product-focused thinking, enabling me to build reliable, high-impact solutions that align with business goals and scale globally, setting me apart in a competitive field.
